i love left 4 dead its my favorite game 2019 to 2030 and over
One of the best games i have ever played. So much fun to grab a few friends and blast through a map on advanced.  Great place to meet some new peeps or hang with some vets..

Ahhh ahhh küçükken kuzenimin verdiği korsan oyunlardan sadece biriydi. Okul çıkışı eve gelip ödevlerimden sonra boş vakitlerimi değerlendirdiğim korku oyunu sandığım bir oyundu. Yağmurlu kapalı havalarda oynamak ayrı bir zevkti...

Бессмысленная игра. Уровни ничем друг от друга не отличаются. Ты просто толпами убиваешь зомби. Никаких интересных механик нет, вы что! Только толпы зомби. Серьезно, в этой игре кроме зомби ничего нет. Уровни отличаются друг от друга только картами. [spoiler] Единственный хороший уровень это жертвоприношение или как там его, он норм, потому что там добавлена новая механика. [/spoiler] А теперь перейдем к плюсам и минусам.
Плюсы:
Разнообразные оружия. В игре довольно много оружий с которых можно пострелять по зомбям, это довольно весело. Было бы весело если бы их не было так много.
Разнообразные враги. Есть охотник, танк, толстяк, ведьма и курильщик. Правда появляются они в каждом уровне в один и тот же момент и совсем не удивляют, но так как их много я засчитаю это за плюс.
Больше плюсов я, к сожалению, найти не смог. Теперь к минусам.
Однотипность и отсутствие разнообразия. Каждый уровень - одно и тоже. Где разнообразие? 
Да, минусов конечно меньше чем плюсов, но этот один минус намного больше этих плюсов. Игра просто напросто не интересная.

Я вот не очень понимаю людей, которые говорят купить 2 часть, вместо покупки и той, и другой. Они аргументируют это тем, что во второй части есть все кампании. Да, но во второй части потерялась сама атмосфера зомби-апокалипсиса. Постоянно день, выжившие второй части не относятся к тому, что произошло серьезно. Они воспринимают это, как повод пострелять. Не стоит забывать о том что было ДО второй части. Я однозначно рекомендую эту игру. Если у вас есть возможность купить обе части, то так и сделайте.

a tank ate me

An outbreak has fallen into the population and they're turning against four survivors. Their only mission is to head to the extraction point where they'll will have to signal the authorities before they can safely return home. Can they survive all four together?

Join the four survivors who will be fighting through the hoardes of zombies as they travel through six campaigns reaching their rendezvous point. Work together to stay alive by playing online with your three friends to keep your cooperativeness going or go single player and challenge yourself around the map with three survivors. Enter survival mode to take on challenge on how long can you last fighting zombies. And play versus mode where you can be the survivors or the infected.

Download addons from the community website to extend the gaming experience between you and your friends.

Survivor horror never takes you on like this. But will surely give you the ability to teamwork and survival together in one game. Unless you want it as part of Valve's library, this game is for you.

Please note that this game has been extended from the original 2008 release as it features 2 additional maps, a survival mode and an addon feature that allows you to download mods from the community.

It is a really nice action game, both for players and spectators. Here we have 4 different difficulties: Easy, Normal, Advanced, Expert. Expert mode is so well designed that it will be still challenging for experienced players. You can also play offline with bots.

This game depends heavily on co-operation aspect. Many of special infected can pin survivors, rendering them helpless until teammates can to rescue. If survivor reach 0 hp, they fall down and need fellow survivor to pick em up.

This game also has a movie intro which explain the basic of the game.

This game has good graphic, and it is still smooth.
i like zombies
best zombies game ever
İyi

This is a great zombie game, it can be played offline or online, solo with bots or with friends. The BOT AI is superb, they will heal, catch up and kill any special infected that got you or your teammate. The gore and effects are fun and will never get boring, the levels are balanced and the story is enticing. 1 downside is the feedback when shooting and killing zombies is minimal.

I gotta be honest here, this is a great classic, but it is a shame that not a lot of people play it anymore. If you are ok playing alone or if you have friends who also have this game, then get it. Oh, and if you are getting l4d2, you can play all of l4d1 maps in the game with the original cast, but you will almost always find someone to play with, since a lot more people play the sequel. So if you do want l4d1 with people to play online with, get l4d2. This review may sound negative, but trust me, it's sadly true. But, all that aside, this is actually a really good zombie game with teamwork and special infected for variety and 4 very different characters that all have an aspect of them you'd want to play, without changing any playstyles for true balance. Definitely buy this game if it is on sale, you won't regret it 1 bit.

Believe it or not, people are still playing the original L4D.

I might enjoy L4D2, but L4D is proof that less is more. A smaller pool of meaningful specials (hunter, smoker, boomer, tank, witch) means they are always a threat and never to be taken lightly. Look at spitters from L4D2 as a comparison; spitters can be a team killer in tight spaces, but in open areas the spitter is trivial. True for many of the special infected in L4D2, they just are not nearly as consistently threatening or challenging as good ole L4D original. Even the L4D2 boomers, smokers, and hunters seem nerfed.

L4D still has an active player base and offers a great tight satisfying experience. Even in 2019

Is incredible! This is a title that still holds up the pass of time. Frantic action with high volumes of zombies and other monstrosities, competent online modes, funny moments inspired by the unexpected hordes and a blast to play with some friends. 

I recommend to enjoy it with some friends, since the solo campaigns run out of gas very quickly. This was a game designed for multiplayer. The good news is that online mode still have players here and there!

Left 4 Dead is a true classic. Graphic wise it still looks amazing and the shadow/light handling helps greatly to the gameplay. Soundwise is superb as well.

If you were like me, who never played it back in the day, you will have so much fun!

Play this if you're an epic gamer.

EDIT: I recently completed the 4 main campaigns on Expert difficulty. Blood Harvest is now my least favourite campaign. blegh

Mükemmel abi 2007 e göre. Online boş ama L4D2 buna çare oluyor.

metamod + sourcemod + l4d1 = chaos, fun, people that connect across the globe including people from japan, bad ping when you locally host the server, little to absolutely no sourcemod and metamod support while having the server being dedicated or official dedicated, a plugin that can create a plane crash animation with sounds and everything at your crosshair, a plugin that adds the beta unused animations for the weapons that makes them feel a thousand times better, and more... much much more. deserves way more recognition. l4d2 gives me a black screen and crashes my system, not sure why.

But hey, I gotta say... Way less guns, less special infected, less maps, only 4 survivors, no specific mechanics, no one man cheeseburger apocalypse and no Leaker and Boomette. Doesn't matter. Game is a masterpiece and is extremely fun, and in my honest opinion:

This game is better than Left 4 Dead 2.
This game is very fun to play but i prefer the 2nd one more.
Buen juego aunque ya casi nadie lo juega, se siente diferente del 2 :v

perfecto para matar a balazos a cualquier tipo de zombie

●Jogabilidade

●Através de quatro campanhas distintas mostradas competentemente de forma cinematográfica, L4D permite a participação de quatro jogadores que precisarão trabalhar juntos através de cinco fases bem desenhadas. Assim, o significado de cooperação nunca foi tão importante em um jogo, tentar virar o Rambo contra os zumbis significará colocar todos na missão em risco, ainda mais quando eles aparecem em centenas correndo atrás de você.

●Como já não fosse suficiente centenas de zumbis sendo atraídos pelos seus sons, pela sua luz e seus movimentos, ainda há aqueles que se transformaram em algo de mais tenebroso. Os Chefes são cinco tipos de infectados um pouco mais desenvolvidos que aparecem aleatoriamente e de forma constante a medida que se avança pelo cenário. Do habilidoso Hunter, do nojento Boomer, do linguarudo Smooker, da pseudo-inocente Witch, até o "zumbi-Hulk" Tank.

●Conclusão

●O jogo, mesmo prendendo por boas horas somente para vencer uma campanha, pode soar um pouquinho repetitivo. De fato, isso não exclui a capacidade de diversão que L4D oferece, mas vai deixar no ar a pitada de podia ter algo mais. Mais armas, mais objetivos, mais desafios, talvez. Mas, fica clara que a intenção foi esta, pelo menos para começo de conversa, e muito bem executada.

Не смотря на баги, не смотря на местами туповатый ии, не смотря на крайне жалкий онлайн в игре - она хороша. Режим режиссера выполнен достаточно неплохо, (по крайней мере, он лучше чем во второй части) стрельба приятная, атмосфера уютная, хоть и темно-мрачная.  Имеет ли смысл брать первую? Только если вы придирчивый к мелочам, как я, (но у меня обе игры куплены, потому что я додик.) из-за чего не желаете играть в кривую вторую часть. В остальном вторая лучше. За те же 250 рублей вы получаете набор из кампаний второй и первой части вместе, улучшенную графику, больше зомби, больше режимов и все в таком вот духе.  Если у вас есть друзья, можете опробовать. Без друзей сюда идти гибло, хотя бы в силу минусового онлайна и просто глуповатых игроков, большинство из которых - новички.(однако комьюнити в любом случае здесь лучше чем во второй лефте kekw) 

Сравнивать вторую часть с первой особо смысла нет. От первой и второй вы получите равное удовольствие, если вы обычный игрок, однако копая глубже в второй части (Разные режимы, реализмы и т.д) вы непременно найдете кучу проблем, коих отродясь не было в первой.
